description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Have you ever made words or messages using alphabetti spaghetti or the magnets on your fridge? Well, Fridgy allows you to do exactly that by turning your TV into one big fridge! In Fridgy you’ll be able to spell out words, messages and simple math using the letters of the alphabet, the numbers 0 to 9 and symbols like + or =. Fridgy may not be a proper game but it is a lot of fun and time flies by!
